list.name: Changes
list.comment:
fix: Add missing files for GitHub workflow
Added/Updated files: - project_file_access.json: Complete file structure mapping - All current and planned files - Quick access URLs - Current project status
- PROJECT_STATUS.md: Current project state - Story progress (1/14 tasks in STORY 1) - Recent commits - Milestones and timeline - Metrics and team info
- FULL_PROJECT_CONTEXT.md: Updated to not require additional loads
This fixes the GitHub load workflow issue where Claude tried to fetch missing files.
Now the workflow is: 1. Paste FULL_PROJECT_CONTEXT.md URL in new chat 2. Claude loads it (self-contained, no additional fetches) 3. Claude responds: '✅ Projekt načítaný. Čo robíme?'
STORY-1 Task 1.2 complete

task.summary:
docs: Add SYSTEM_PROMPT and FULL_PROJECT_CONTEXT
Created comprehensive documentation for GitHub-based workflow:
SYSTEM_PROMPT.md: - Complete project overview - Critical rules and reminders - Template for new chat sessions - Quick reference URLs
FULL_PROJECT_CONTEXT.md: - Combined MASTER_CONTEXT + PROJECT_STATUS - Single source of truth for project - Complete architecture documentation - All STORIES and development plan - Database schemas - n8n workflows - Deployment guidelines
This enables seamless project continuation across chat sessions by loading project context directly from GitHub.
Usage: Paste SYSTEM_PROMPT.md content or load FULL_PROJECT_CONTEXT.md URL at start of new chat session.
STORY-1 Task 1.2 progress docs: documentation infrastructure complete

docs: Add GitHub-based workflow for new chat sessions
Updated FULL_PROJECT_CONTEXT.md: - Added explicit instructions for Claude - When user pastes URL, Claude automatically loads project - Claude responds: '✅ Projekt načítaný. Čo robíme?' - Same workflow as supplier_invoice_loader project
Added QUICK_START.md: - Simple guide for starting new chat sessions - Just paste one URL and go - Quick reference for common tasks
Usage: New chat → Paste URL → Claude loads → Ready to work! https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rauschiccsk/orthodox-portal/main/docs/FULL_PROJECT_CONTEXT.md
STORY-1 Task 1.2 progress docs: GitHub workflow complete

docs: Add missing documentation files
- config_template.py - PROJECT_STATUS.md - project_file_access.json - MASTER_CONTEXT.md
These files are required for GitHub-based workflow
